a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Attendance vs enrollment rates, primary education, 2015
The horizontal axis shows the net enrollment rate (total number of students in the age group for primary education
enrolled in that level, expressed as a percentage of the total population in that age group). The vertical axis shows
net attendance rate proportion of children of the official primary school age who are attending primary school
Net enrollment rate. Primary. Both sexes (%)
Net attendance rate. Primary. Both sexes (%)
Data source: Demographic and Health Surveys (DHS), UNESCO Institute for Statistics
